Translations.Text: Dangshi, tamen zhong youyi huo ren shuo:“An la yao jiayi huimie, huo jiayi yancheng de minzhong, nimen hebi quan jie tamen ne?” Tamen shuo:“Yinwei qiu de nimen de zhu de yuanliang, erqie xiwang tamen neng jingwei.”
Dang tamen bu caina zhonggao de shihou, wo zhengjiule jie ren zuo'e zhe, er yi yanxing chengfa bu yi zhe, yinwei tamen fanle zui
Dang tamen wangzizunda, bu ken zunshou jielu de shihou, wo dui tamen shuo:“Nimen bian cheng beijian de houzi ba!”
Dangshi, ni de zhu xuanbu ta yiding pai ren lai shi tamen jixu zaoshou kuxing, zhidao fuhuo ri. Ni de zhu que shi chengfa shensu de. Ta que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
Wo ceng shi tamen san chu sifang, chengwei ruogan paibie, tamen zhong you shanren, you ci yu shanren de, wo yong zhongzhong huo fu kaoyan tamen, yibian tamen juewu

Zai tamen siwang zhihou, you buxiao de houyi daiti tamen er jichengle tian jing, naxie houyi juequ jinshi fu li, hai shuo:“Women jiang meng raoshu.” Ruguo you tongyang de fu li lai dao tamen de shenbian, tamen hai jiang juequ. Nandao tian jing zhong meiyou mingwen jiaodao tamen zhi neng yi zhenli guiyu an la ma? Nandao tamen meiyou song xi naxie mingwen ma? Houshi de anzhai, duiyu jingwei zhe shi geng youmei de. Nandao nimen bu lijie ma
Jianchi tian jing, jin shou bai gong zhe, wo bi bu hui shi tamen dangzhong de xingshan zhe tulao wu chou
